epics.title: Interactive CLI Interface Completion
epics.description: Complete the interactive CLI interface with full menu functionality, user experience improvements, and contextual navigation. Bridge the gap between current implementation and architecture vision.

userStories.title: Complete Interactive Menu System
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a fully functional interactive menu system that provides contextual options based on project state, so I can navigate workflows without memorizing commands
acceptanceCriteria: All menu actions are implemented and functional
Context-aware menu options based on project state
Keyboard shortcuts and navigation work properly
Clear visual feedback for current position and next steps
Error handling and graceful fallbacks for all menu actions

userStories.title: Task-Level CRUD Operations in CLI
userStories.description: As a developer, I want comprehensive task-level operations accessible through the CLI interface, so I can manage fine-grained work items efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Task creation from stories, issues, and direct input
Task editing and status management through CLI
Clear task hierarchy display and navigation

userStories.title: Context Restoration for Interruption Stack
userStories.description: As a developer, I want seamless context restoration when returning from interruptions, so I can resume work without losing mental state
acceptanceCriteria: Restoration of previous work state and position

userStories.title: Enhanced User Experience and Navigation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want an intuitive and efficient CLI experience with clear guidance and minimal friction, so I can focus on development rather than tool usage
acceptanceCriteria: Clear status indicators and progress visualization
Consistent color scheme and visual hierarchy
Help system and command discovery features

epics.title: Advanced Workflow Analytics and Metrics
epics.description: Implement comprehensive analytics, performance monitoring, and workflow optimization features to help developers understand and improve their development patterns.

userStories.title: Workflow Performance Analytics
userStories.description: As a developer, I want detailed analytics about my workflow performance, so I can identify bottlenecks and optimize my development process
acceptanceCriteria: Epic, story, and task completion time tracking
Time spent in different workflow phases

userStories.title: Pattern Recognition and Optimization
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the system to recognize patterns in my workflow and suggest optimizations, so I can continuously improve my development efficiency
acceptanceCriteria: Failure pattern analysis and prevention suggestions
Integration with mem0 for pattern persistence

userStories.title: Real-time Monitoring Dashboard
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a real-time dashboard showing current project health and metrics, so I can make informed decisions about workflow adjustments
acceptanceCriteria: GitHub integration status and sync health

epics.title: Headless Mode and API Integration
epics.description: Implement headless mode for programmatic access and prepare foundation for VSCode extension integration. Enable automation and external tool integration.

userStories.title: JSON API Mode Implementation
userStories.description: As an external tool developer, I want a JSON API mode for programmatic access to all CLI functionality, so I can integrate the workflow manager with other tools
acceptanceCriteria: All CLI commands accessible via JSON API
Authentication and security for external access
Documentation and examples for API usage

userStories.title: VSCode Extension Foundation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the groundwork for VSCode extension integration, so I can eventually use visual workflow management within my IDE

userStories.title: External Tool Integration Framework
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a framework for integrating external tools and services, so I can extend the workflow manager with custom functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Webhook support for external service notifications
Security model for external tool access

epics.title: Enterprise-Level Robustness and Scaling
epics.description: Enhance system robustness, performance, and scalability for handling large projects and complex workflows. Focus on enterprise-grade reliability and efficiency.

userStories.title: Database Backend Alternative
userStories.description: As a developer working on large projects, I want an optional database backend for improved performance and scalability, so I can manage complex projects efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Migration tools from JSON to database format

userStories.title: Advanced Performance Optimization
userStories.description: As a developer, I want optimal performance for large-scale projects, so I can work efficiently regardless of project size and complexity
acceptanceCriteria: Memory usage optimization for large projects
Lazy loading and streaming for large datasets

userStories.title: Enterprise Security and Compliance
userStories.description: As an enterprise developer, I want enterprise-grade security features and compliance support, so I can use the tool in corporate environments
acceptanceCriteria: Data encryption at rest and in transit

epics.title: Intelligent Automation and AI Integration
epics.description: Implement advanced AI integration and automation features for intelligent workflow assistance, code generation, and decision support.

userStories.title: Automated Epic and Story Generation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want AI-assisted epic and story generation from high-level requirements, so I can quickly structure complex projects

userStories.title: Intelligent Code Review and Suggestions
userStories.description: As a developer, I want AI-powered code review and improvement suggestions integrated into the workflow, so I can maintain high code quality

userStories.title: Predictive Workflow Intelligence
userStories.description: As a developer, I want predictive intelligence about workflow outcomes and potential issues, so I can proactively address problems
acceptanceCriteria: Risk assessment and early warning system
Machine learning model training and refinement

sequencingStrategy.phase2: Add analytics and headless mode (EPIC-002, EPIC-003)
sequencingStrategy.phase3: Enterprise scaling and AI features (EPIC-004, EPIC-005)
